title: Multimedia E-Learning Course for Systematic Interpretation of Chest X-Rays

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning support for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze chest X-ray images based on anatomical landmarks
Learners can identify and describe the radiological features of ten major thoracic diseases
Learners can reduce errors in X-ray interpretation by over 30% using multimedia learning materials

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
